104173 104469 104470 104471 104472 104473 104474 104475 104476 104477 104478 104566 104567 104568 104569 104570 104571 104572 104573 104574 104575 104576 104577 104578 104579 104581 104582 104583 104584 104585 104586 104587 104588 104589 104590 104591 104592 104593 104594 40323 40359 40398 40755 49133 49155 49161 49166 49169 49170 49172 49173 49174 49175 49191 49192 49194 49195 49196 49197 49198 49199 49200 49921 49922 49923 49934 49935 49936 49937 49938 50669 50670 50671 50672 50673 50674 50675 50676 50677 50678 50679 50680 50682 50683 50684 50685 50686 50687 50688 50689 50690 50691 50692 50694 51624 51627 51628 62713 66154 66156 66157 66158 66277 66341 66342 66343 66344 66345 66346 66348 66349 66350 66351 66352 66353 66354 66355 66364 66376 66377 66378 66379 66380 66381 66382 66384 66385 66386 66387 66388 66394 66395 66396 66397 66398 66399 66400 66401 66402 66404 66405 66406 66407 66408 66409 66410 66423 82584 82585 82587 82589 82590 82594 84628 84629 97057 97074 97075 97076 97077 97078 97079 97080 97081 97083 97084 97085 97086 97087 97088 97089 97090 97091 97092 97093 97095 97096 97097 97098 97099 97100 97101 97102 97103 97104 97105 97107 97108 97109 97111 97112 97113 97114 97115 97116 97117 97118 97119 97120 97121 97122 97125 97129 97132 97134 97135 97137 97139 97141 97143 97144 97146 97148 97150 97152 97154 97155 97157 97159 97160 97163 97164 97165 97166 97167 97168 97170 97171 97172 97173 97174 97175 97177 106609 106646 106647 106648 106649 106650 106653 106654 106663 106804 106805 106814 106815 106816 106817 106818 106819 106820 106821 106822 106823 106824 106825 106826 106838 106839 106840 106842 106849 106851 106852 106853 106860 106861 106862 106864 106866 106867 106868 106869 106873 106874 106875 106876 106882 106883 106884 106885 106886 106889 106891 106893 106894 106895 106896 106897 106898 106900 106906 106907 106909 106910 106911 106912 106913 106914 106927 106928 106929 106932 106933 106934 106935 106936 106945 106947

"id:104173 104469 104470 104471 104472 104473 104474 104475 104476 104477 104478 104566 104567 104568 104569 104570 104571 104572 104573 104574 104575 104576 104577 104578 104579 104581 104582 104583 104584 104585 104586 104587 104588 104589 104590 104591 104592 104593 104594 40323 40359 40398 40755 49133 49155 49161 49166 49169 49170 49172 49173 49174 49175 49191 49192 49194 49195 49196 49197 49198 49199 49200 49921 49922 49923 49934 49935 49936 49937 49938 50669 50670 50671 50672 50673 50674 50675 50676 50677 50678 50679 50680 50682 50683 50684 50685 50686 50687 50688 50689 50690 50691 50692 50694 51624 51627 51628 62713 66154 66156 66157 66158 66277 66341 66342 66343 66344 66345 66346 66348 66349 66350 66351 66352 66353 66354 66355 66364 66376 66377 66378 66379 66380 66381 66382 66384 66385 66386 66387 66388 66394 66395 66396 66397 66398 66399 66400 66401 66402 66404 66405 66406 66407 66408 66409 66410 66423 82584 82585 82587 82589 82590 82594 84628 84629 97057 97074 97075 97076 97077 97078 97079 97080 97081 97083 97084 97085 97086 97087 97088 97089 97090 97091 97092 97093 97095 97096 97097 97098 97099 97100 97101 97102 97103 97104 97105 97107 97108 97109 97111 97112 97113 97114 97115 97116 97117 97118 97119 97120 97121 97122 97125 97129 97132 97134 97135 97137 97139 97141 97143 97144 97146 97148 97150 97152 97154 97155 97157 97159 97160 97163 97164 97165 97166 97167 97168 97170 97171 97172 97173 97174 97175 97177 106609 106646 106647 106648 106649 106650 106653 106654 106663 106804 106805 106814 106815 106816 106817 106818 106819 106820 106821 106822 106823 106824 106825 106826 106838 106839 106840 106842 106849 106851 106852 106853 106860 106861 106862 106864 106866 106867 106868 106869 106873 106874 106875 106876 106882 106883 106884 106885 106886 106889 106891 106893 106894 106895 106896 106897 106898 106900 106906 106907 106909 106910 106911 106912 106913 106914 106927 106928 106929 106932 106933 106934 106935 106936 106945 106947" 

---
# This GoobiScript allows to add a new workflow step into the workflow.
action: addStep

# Title of the workflow step to add
steptitle: Farbprofile entfernen

# This number defines where in the workflow this new step is ordered into. Numerical values or the keyword "end" are permitted in order to insert the step at a specific position or at the end
order: 700

---
# This GoobiScript allow to configure a specific workflow step (e.g. to work as metadata edition step, to automatically run a plugin).
action: setStepProperty

# Title of the workflow step to configure
steptitle: Farbprofile entfernen

# Name of the property to be changed. Possible values are: 
# `metadata` `readimages` `writeimages` `validate` `exportdms` `batch` `automatic` `importfileupload` 
#`acceptandclose` `acceptmoduleandclose` `script` `delay` `updatemetadataindex` `generatedocket`
property: automatic

# Value that the property shall have (e.g. `true` or `false`)
value: true

---
# This GoobiScript allows to add a shell script to an existing workflow step.
action: addShellScriptToStep

# This is the title of the workflow step to be used.
steptitle: Farbprofile entfernen

# Define a label for the script that shall be visible for that script inside of an accepted task.
label: remove color profiles

# Define the script that shall be added here.
script: /bin/bash /opt/digiverso/goobi/scripts/removeColorProfiles.sh "{tifpath}"

---
# This GoobiScript allows to execute on specific or all scripts that are assiged to an existing workflow step.
action: runScript

# Title of the workflow step which has scripts that shall be executed
steptitle: Farbprofile entfernen

# Name of a specific scripts to be executed. If this parameter is missing then all scripts of the defined task are executed.
script: remove color profiles

---
# This GoobiScript allows to change the current status of a specific step in the workflow.
action: setStepStatus

# Title of the workflow step to be changed
steptitle: Farbprofile entfernen

# Value of the status. Possible values are `0` (locked), `1` (open), `2` (in work), `3` (done), `4` (error), `5` (deactivated)
status: 5
